originalText.text:
I had a great experience with NestApple. My broker was very knowledgeable and truly had my best interest at heart.

A few days after the closing, NestApple returned to us 2/3 of the broker’s commission, which was very welcome.

I highly recommend working with NestApple in general and our broker, Michele, in particular.

originalText.text: It was a great experience working with Cristina Casamatta  from NestApple. She is professional and friendly. Helped us with all the logistics needed to buy an apartment in NYC. The process is much smoother with her help and guidance. The generous commission rebate was sent to us the same day of closing.

text.text: It was a great experience working with Cristina Casamatta  from NestApple. She is professional and friendly. Helped us with all the logistics needed to buy an apartment in NYC. The process is much smoother with her help and guidance. The generous commission rebate was sent to us the same day of closing.

originalText.text: Nicole and Georges were wonderful to work with and I'd highly recommend them for your NYC real estate purchase! What I was most impressed with was that given the volume of deals they are across as a team, they can provide great guidance and tips on the market. I'd recommend NestApple if you prefer to do some of the homework yourself on listings you want to see and make appointments yourself -- they really come in to help once you want to make an offer (which is really the hard part any way of the process). The commission rebate was sent within days of closing so they are quick and speedy! I was able to use this rebate towards renovations in the apartment so that was great. Thank you Nicole and Georges for all of your help!

originalText.text:
I decided to list my apartment for rent with NestApple, and I couldn't be happier with their service and the overall outcome.
Before I get to the results, let me tell you that Cristina from NestApple is a pleasure to work with. She is committed to getting the job done. She offered a white-gloved service when listing my apartment for rent. I live out of town, and Cristina had no issue coordinating the general repairs I needed to complete to rent the place. Once the apartment was move-in ready, she wasted no time and took care of the photos and virtual staging of the unit. The pictures came out so good!
She held an open house, and several applicants instantly came in. After selecting the best candidate, she put together a board package that was thorough and well-prepared. The board accepted, and I was in contract with a new tenant within days. All thanks to Cristina and NestApple. I will use them when I am ready to sell!

originalText.text: NestApple was instrumental in helping us sell 2 apartments in Manhattan in 2022. We used their service every step of the way: they provided us with a contractor for minor upgrades, a photographer, and gave us great perspective on pricing. Their open houses were planned ahead and not intrusive. They always responded quickly to our questions. They introduced us to a great team of real estate lawyers. They were extremely helpful with last minute closing details (handing over keys, final check of the apt). I will absolutely use their service if we do another real estate transaction - 5 stars!
